attributes.action: Place Rent, Mortgages, Utillity bills on payment Holidays Untill Covid-19 passes
attributes.additional_details: This will safe guard our homes businesses and frankly the country going under becouse of this virus ..as abusiness owner of a hairdressing salon, this is effecting me already and im already loosing money and reducing staff hours ..as people are staying away ..we need your help to ..put Mortgages Rents Utillities (MRU's) on hold to give the country a fighting chance to survive our lively hood and the virus !! Please please Help Louise Hamkinson-Everatt
attributes.background: I want the Utillities Mortgages and Rents for domestic an businesses placed on payment holidays / on hold ...until covid-19 Carona virus has passed ...to give the public time an less worry to cope with this virus, i own my own business an will have to close my business of 13 yrs if i can not trade

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
